thing-type.label: HomeKit Accessory
thing-type.description: HomeKit accessory with its own LAN connection

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: IP v4 address of the HomeKit accessory.

parameter.name: hostName
parameter.label: Host Name
parameter.description: The accessory fully qualified host name as discovered by mDNS.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval at which the accessory is polled in sec.

bridge-type.label: HomeKit Bridge
bridge-type.description: HomeKit accessory with LAN connection that supports bridged accessories not having an own LAN connection

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: IP v4 address of the HomeKit bridge.

parameter.name: hostName
parameter.label: Host Name
parameter.description: The bridge fully qualified host name as discovered by mDNS.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval at which the bridge is polled in sec.

thing-type.label: HomeKit Bridged Accessory
thing-type.description: HomeKit without its own LAN connection and instead supported by a bridge
